name: TinyPopConfirm

cancel-button.description: Whether or not to display a cancel button

custom-class.description: Customize the class name for the bubble tooltip
custom-class.description_zh: 为气泡提示框自定义类名

message.description: The contents of the bubble tooltip

placement.description: The position of the bubble tooltip is displayed

title.description: Set the title of the bubble tooltip
title.description_zh: 设置气泡提示框的标题

trigger.description: The bubble prompt shows how it was triggered
trigger.description_zh: 气泡提示框显示触发方式

type.description: Hint icon type, you can pass in a custom icon
type.description_zh: 提示图标类型，可以传入自定义图标

width.description: The width of the bubble tooltip

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the Confirm button is clicked

events.name: hide
events.description: Triggered when the bubble acknowledges the box is closed
events.description_zh: 气泡确认框关闭时触发

events.name: show
events.description: Triggered when the bubble confirmation box is displayed
events.description_zh: 气泡确认框显示时触发

slots.name: reference
slots.description: The HTML element that triggers the bubble prompt to display
slots.description_zh: 触发气泡提示框显示的 HTML 元素

description: 使用说明文字及操作按钮对较简单的操作进行二次确认。
description_zh: 使用说明文字及操作按钮对较简单的操作进行二次确认。
